metadata.title: CVE-2017-0455 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - high
metadata.description: An information disclosure vulnerability in the Qualcomm bootloader couldhelp to enable a local malicious application to to execute arbitrary codewithin the context of the bootloader. This issue is rated as High becauseit is a general bypass for a bootloader level defense in depth or exploitmitigation technology. Product: Android. Versions: Kernel-3.18. Android ID:A-32370952. References: QC-CR#1082755.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
